oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of 5th Infantry Brigade, 3rd Division in Andernach, Germany
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pictured en masse, officers and enlisted men of the 3rd "Rock of the Marne" Division of the American Army of Occupation pose near Andernach, Germany on July 9, 1919. the hundreds of soldiers are posed in alternating uniforms, greatcoats and white T-shirts so as to resemble the shoulder sleeve insignia of the 3rd Division. Nine veteran American divisions were held over after the 1918 armistice in the German Rhineland as part of an allied army of occupation.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
